title: titleraw
description: Controls the text and behavior for screen titles using JSON messages.

fields.title: player
fields.description: A player name `string` or [`target selector`](https://learn.microsoft.com/minecraft/creator/documents/commandsintroduction#target-selectors) to identify the player.

fields.title: titleLocation
fields.description: The location where the raw title will display. Uses the `TitleRawSet` Enums `title`, `subtitle`, or `actionbar`.

fields.title: raw json titleText
fields.description: A JSON `string` for the raw title text.

fields.title: fadeIn
fields.description: The number of gameticks for the raw title to fade in. Default: `0`.

fields.title: stay
fields.description: The number of gameticks for the raw title to stay. Default: `0`.

fields.title: fadeOut
fields.description: The number of gameticks for the raw title to fade out. Default: `0`.

overloads.title: Clear raw title
overloads.description: `Clear` the raw title for a given `player`.

overloads.title: Reset raw title
overloads.description: `Reset` the raw subtitle text for a given `player` to blank text and sets the `fadeIn`, `stay`, and `fadeOut` times to their default values.

overloads.title: Add raw title
overloads.description: Add a raw title for a `player` at a given `location` with a `title message`.

overloads.title: Add raw title, fade in, fade out
overloads.description: Add a raw title for a `player` with set `fadeIn`, `stay`, `fadeOut` times.
